meanings.definition: The leaves of the coriander plant, used as an herb in cooking.
meanings.sent1: I added fresh cilantros to the salsa for a burst of flavor.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for a handful of cilantros to enhance the dish.
meanings.sent3: The cilantros in the garden danced in the breeze, spreading their delightful scent.
meanings.sent4: The cilantros in the dish were like little bursts of freshness in every bite.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green cilantros added a pop of color to the plate.

meanings.definition: A pungent herb with a strong aroma and flavor, often used in Mexican and Asian cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The aroma of cilantros filled the kitchen as I chopped them for the curry.
meanings.sent2: Cilantros are a staple in many Mexican dishes, adding a unique taste.
meanings.sent3: The cilantros in the stir-fry were feeling spicy and adventurous.
meanings.sent4: The cilantros in the soup were like little flavor explosions in every spoonful.
meanings.sent5: The bold flavor of cilantros lingered on my taste buds after the meal.
